amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding for the FTC to issue Unfair Competition rulemakings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
